name: Bottomless Pit!
description:
yeah so in old retro games they have manuals that tell you all about the hazards don't touch bullet or you die and don't touch mushroom or you die and watch out for the bottomless pits they actually kind of called them bottomless pits 

understand that around here kat never use up all lives they just fall forever

if you leave the game running in 2 days or something kat will die from lack of water drinking but this feature not implemented yet so kat just tell himself bedtime stories for several years so yeah
